My Bucket List

1. Travel to Japan

I want to explore the streets of Tokyo and visit the traditional temples in Kyoto during the cherry blossom season.

2. Skydiving

Experience the ultimate adrenaline rush by jumping out of a plane and seeing the world from a different perspective.

3. Learn Piano

Mastering at least three classical pieces on the piano to play for my friends and family during gatherings.

4. See the Northern Lights

Travel to Iceland or Norway to witness the Aurora Borealis dancing across the dark winter sky.

5. Write a manga and draw the characters

Finish writing and self-publishing a collection of manga pages inspired by my personal fantasy and characters.

6. Run a Marathon

Train consistently to complete a full 42km marathon and earn that finisher's medal.

7. Learn a New Language

Become conversational in a third language to better connect with people from different cultures.

8. Scuba Diving

Get certified and explore the underwater beauty of the Great Barrier Reef.

9. Collect as many manga as I want

Collect 100 or more of my favorite physical manga and set up a cozy reading nook in my home.

10. Live abroad

Experience life living abroad or in the place I mostly want to visit.
